titleStmt.title: A true and perfect relation of the whole transactions concerning the petition of the six counties of South-Wales, and the county of Monmouth, formerly presented to the Parliament of the Common-Wealth of England for a supply of Godly ministers, and an account of ecclesiasticall revenues therein with Parliaments resolves, and proceedings thereupon, now humbly represented to His Highnesse the Lord Protector's consideration / published by A.G.
titleStmt.author: Griffith, Alexander, d. 1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.G. for Math. Ekins ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
